title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) O’level subjects obtained at not more than 2 sittings including English Language, Mathematics and at least one of Economics/Commerce

 

Two (2) other credit passes in any of Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping, Statistics, Government, Geography, History, Business Methods/Studies/Management, Literature in English, Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Civic Education, Insurance, Language (Yoruba/Hausa/Igbo/French) and Religious Studies (CRK/IRK)
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, and any two of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Account and Economics

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) O’level subjects at not more than two sittings including Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

 

Two (2) other credit passes from Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, History, Further Mathematics, Geography, Economics/Commerce, Technical Drawing/ Graphic Design, Building Construction,  Painting and Decoration/Fine-Art, Wood Work, Basic Electronics, Computer Studies, Religious Studies (CRK/IRK), Carpentry and Joinery.

 

A pass in Technical Drawing /Fine Art will be an advantage
subjects: English Language, Mathematics (compulsory) and any 2 of Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing

title: ART & DESIGN

subjects: English Language, Fine-Art and 2 other of Mathematics, History, Chemistry, Biology and a Nigerian Language (Yoruba/Igbo/Hausa)

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements:
(a)    Credit passes in five (5) O’ level subjects obtained at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and one credit from Physics/Chemistry/Biology /Agricultural Science.

 

(b)   One (1) other credit pass from Geography, Government, Technical Drawing, Commerce, Fine Art, Principle of Accounts, Book-Keeping,  Nigerian Language (Yoruba/Igbo/Hausa), Food and Nutrition, Literature in English, Wood Work and Metal Work.

 

However, any two (2) credit passes in Science subjects (Physics, Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science) with English Language, Mathematics and Economics could be considered for Science based students
subjects: English Language, Mathematics (compulsory), and any other two (2) of Economics, Art, Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: FOOD TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:

(b)   Other credit pass from the following subjects; Economics, Geography, Further Mathematics, Physics and Technical Drawing, Home Economics, Food and Nutrition, Animal Husbandry, Basic catering and food services and Fisheries and Catering Craft Practice.

 

 A pass in Physics is required (along with other five credits).
subjects: English Language, Agricultural Science/Biology (compulsory) and any two (2) of Economics, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics
